properties.name: application.boot.enabled
properties.description: Application Boot configuration, enabled as default, for preloading classes defined by BootstrapSource SPI.

properties.name: application.opentelemetry.enabled
properties.description: OpenTelemetry auto configuration for OpenTelemetry observation, enabled as default and depended by io.opentelemetry.api.OpenTelemetry.

properties.name: application.opentelemetry.trace.enabled
properties.description: OpenTelemetry tracer auto configuration, enabled as default and depended by io.opentelemetry.sdk.OpenTelemetrySdk.
